definition: regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: But sometimes you just have to take the plunge.
sentences.chinese: 你是說，讓我不管三七二十一，跳進海里就好了？

sentences.english: Boar seen by Buha, the impulse to just-over.
sentences.chinese: 公野豬看到了布哈依，就不管三七二十一的衝了過來。

sentences.english: I'm not care three seven twenty-one.

definition: not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
three sevens are twenty-one (idiom)/the facts of the matter/the actual situation
not distinguishing red-green or black-white (idiom)/not to distinguish between right and wrong
pinyin: bu4 wen4 qing1 hong2 zao4 bai2

definition: three, set five remove two (abacus rule)/efficiently/quickly and easily
see 二話不說|二话不说[er4 hua4 bu4 shuo1]
not distinguishing red-green or black-white (idiom)/not to distinguish between right and wrong
pinyin: bu4 fen1 qing1 hong2 zao4 bai2

definition: like a swarm of bees/everyone swarms around pushing and shouting/a hornet's nest
erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
